safe_products.name: PURGENE FACE WHITENING AMPOULES WITH DERMAROLLER
safe_products.key_benefits: Brightens and evens skin tone; reduces dark spots; suppresses melanin production; antioxidant protection; enhances texture for radiant, youthful skin.
safe_products.description: Lightens and whitens skin by targeting pigmentation with potent actives like Glutathione, Niacinamide, Arbutin, Lecithin, Vitamin C and E. Includes dermaroller to boost absorption and results.

safe_products.name: DENEFIS® EYEBROW & EYELASH CARE SERUM
safe_products.ingredients_text: Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil.
safe_products.key_benefits: Nourishes eyebrows and eyelashes, helps them appear stronger, fuller, and more lively.
safe_products.description: Thanks to the nourishing oils in its content, this serum supports the health and vitality of your eyebrows and eyelashes, helping them look stronger and fuller.

safe_products.name: DENEFIS® AHA+BHA SERUM
safe_products.ingredients_text: Aqua, Glycolic Acid, Lactic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Glycerin, Propanediol, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
safe_products.key_benefits: AHA+BHA Serum purifies the skin, supports self-renewal, revitalizes the skin, controls sebum balance, helps prevent acne formation, tightens pores, and helps reduce local skin blemishes.
safe_products.description: AHA (Alpha Hydroxy Acids) and BHA (Beta Hydroxy Acids) provide a peeling effect. AHA+BHA Serum is a care serum that helps prevent acne formation by cleansing your skin from dead skin cells, controlling sebum balance, tightening pores, and reducing local skin blemishes. The serum is enriched with active ingredients and helps meet your skin’s moisture needs with Hyaluronic Acid.

safe_products.name: KALEE BEAUTY 2-IN-1 LIP OIL & CHEEK TINT - PINK
safe_products.ingredients_text: Versagel, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cannabis Sativa (Hempseed) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Lip-Safe Mica Pigments.
safe_products.key_benefits: Lightweight, non-sticky formula that nourishes lips and cheeks, restores moisture, reduces pigmentation over time, and delivers a natural dewy glow. Multipurpose and travel-friendly.
safe_products.description: A skin-loving tint that glides on like oil and leaves your lips and cheeks with a fresh, radiant flush. Packed with nourishing oils rich in essential fatty acids and vitamins to hydrate, soothe, and revitalize your skin without any stickiness. Perfect for everyday multitasking beauty.

safe_products.key_benefits: Helps eliminate symptoms of genital dryness during intercourse. Maintains soft and gentle lubrication for a longer and more intense sexual experience.
safe_products.description: Purgène Delay Effect Lubricant Gel is designed to alleviate genital dryness and provide enhanced lubrication during sexual intercourse. Its soft and gentle formula enhances comfort and contributes to a prolonged and intensified experience.

safe_products.key_benefits:
Removes secretions, cleanses effectively, provides freshness,
alcohol-free and gentle.
safe_products.description:
Natural, alcohol-free douche for effective vaginal cleansing,
helps eliminate secretions, leaves the intimate area clean and fresh, suitable for those seeking thorough hygiene.

safe_products.name: PURGENE PREBIOTIC INTIMATE FOAM PH 4.2
safe_products.ingredients_text: Aqua, Prebiotic Complex, Mild Cleansers, Free from Parabens, Soap, Allergen Fragrances, Alcohol.
safe_products.key_benefits:
Reduces itching sensations, soothes irritation, restores
freshness, promotes intimate hygiene, helps maintain pH balance, and reduces yeast infections.
safe_products.description:
Designed for intimate hygiene, reduces itching, irritation, and
discomfort. Supports a healthy microbiome and pH balance, prevents infections, ideal during fitness, travel, menstruation, pregnancy, and postpartum. Free from parabens, soap, allergen fragrances, and alcohol.

safe_products.name: DENEFIS STEM CELL 50+ SPF BB CREAM
safe_products.ingredients_text: Aqua, Titanium Dioxide, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Phospholipids, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Benzophenone-3, TALC, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethicone, Carbomer, Allantoin, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopheryl Acetate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Lecithin, Parfum, Cyclopentasiloxane, Swertia Chirata Extract, Polysorbate 20, Tetrasodium EDTA, Linalool, D-Limonene, CI 77499, CI 77492, CI 77491.
safe_products.key_benefits: The Stem Cell 50+ SPF BB Cream brightens skin tone, hydrates and firms, reduces fine lines, evens complexion, and provides high sun protection.
safe_products.description: Its unique formulation, enhanced with plant stem cells, attempts to shield your skin from the sun's damaging rays while maintaining the integrity of your skin's color and balancing out your skin tone with its light structure. With plant stem cells in this unique composition fortified with active substances, it promotes cell rejuvenation. Hyaluronic acid and allantoin help to meet your skin's moisture needs; phospholipids make moisturizing substances easier to permeate the skin; vitamin E helps to repair sun-damaged skin; and panthenol helps to reinforce the skin barrier.

safe_products.name: DENEFIS VITAMIN C SERUM
safe_products.ingredients_text: Aqua, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Panthenol, Polysorbate 20, Allantoin, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tetrasodium EDTA.
safe_products.key_benefits: Denefis Vitamin C Serum brightens skin, reduces dark spots, boosts collagen production, and protects against environmental damage.
safe_products.description: The goal of Vitamin C Serum is to revive and brighten your skin. Strongened by active components, the serum's ascorbic acid helps to balance skin tone, prevent age spots, and improve collagen formation, giving the appearance of firmer, more vibrant skin. With its hydrating properties, hyaluronic acid, glycerin, allantoin, and vitamin B5 (Panthenol) help to give tired-looking skin a more vibrant appearance.

safe_products.name: DENEFIS OIL BASED FACE CLEANSING MIX
safe_products.ingredients_text: Aqua, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Glycerin, Lauryl Glucoside, Niacinamide, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Zinc PCA, Lactic Acid, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Panthenol, Achillea Millefolium Flower Extract, Tetrasodium EDTA.
safe_products.key_benefits: The key benefits of Denefis oil-based face cleansing mix are effectively removing makeup and impurities, dissolving excess oil without stripping the skin, maintaining hydration, and leaving the skin soft and balanced.
safe_products.description: It is a nourishing and rinseable oil-based mixture that can be used in the first stage of the two-stage skin cleansing. It supports balancing the oil production in the skin with Zinc PCA in its improved formula. It helps to reduce the formation of blackheads with Niacinamide, and to soften and moisturize the skin with Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract and Panthenol. Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract and Achillea Millefolium Flower Extract support the soothing and purifying of the skin.

safe_products.name: DENEFIS PURIFYING PORE SERUM
safe_products.ingredients_text: Aqua, Alcohol, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Vitis Vinifera Seed Extract, Salicylic Acid, Propanediol, Glycerin, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Salvia Officinalis Leaf Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Allantoin, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Tetrasodium EDTA.
safe_products.key_benefits: Denefis Purifying Pore Serum deeply cleanses pores, minimizes their appearance, controls excess oil, prevents breakouts, and promotes smoother, clearer skin.
safe_products.description: It helps eliminate dead skin cells and provide clarity to the skin. This compound, from the Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA) group, is especially effective on oily and acne-prone skin. Salicylic Acid helps gently cleanse dead cells on the surface of the skin, soothe and purify the skin. It penetrates the inner walls of clogged pores and cleans foreign substances, while helping to increase circulation and remove excess sebum. Other active ingredients help support skin health with their Anti-Microbial and Anti-Oxidant properties.

safe_products.name: DENEFIS DEEP FACE CLEANSING FOAMING GEL
safe_products.ingredients_text: Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Benzoate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Calendula Officinalis Flower Oil, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana Extract, Citric Acid, Benzophenone-4, Panthenol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Allantoin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Parfum.
safe_products.key_benefits: Denefis Deep Face Cleansing Foaming Gel deeply cleanses pores, reduces blackheads, balances oil production, and soothes skin with salicylic acid and botanical extracts.
safe_products.description: Its 1% Salicylic Acid and Hamamelis Virginia Extract content serve to balance the skin's sebum rate, which helps to minimize the greasy look while also preventing acne and blackheads at their worst by thoroughly cleansing the skin. Panthenol (Vitamin B5) hydrates the skin and enhances the function of the skin barrier, while Allantoin, Calendula Officinalis Flower Oil and Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract helps to protect and calm the skin.
